<html><body><div><div class="mx-auto mb-6 px-4 md:px-0 text-lg font-normal leading-8 text-gray-800"><p class="Paragraph_wrapper__6w7GG">"I got this almighty shove from my right and I went flying, lifted off the ground ... and then this one copper just punched me as I was trying to get my balance," she told AAP just hours after returning from hospital.</p></div></div></body></html>
